properties.notes: Open for uphill travel unless closed by Patrol; please be cautious of on-hill machinery.
properties.name: Cinder Cone Route

properties.notes: Open for uphill travel when Pine Marten Lift is open unless route is closed by Patrol.
properties.name: Pine Marten Route

properties.notes: Open for uphill travel when Summit Lift is open unless route is closed by Patrol.
properties.name: Summit Route

properties.short_description: Early beginner learning zone with gently graded slopes, small snow features, and banked turns.

long_description.what: An introductory learning based terrain zone with graded slopes and banked turns to familiarize skiers and riders with their edges, turning, pumping and progression
long_description.who: First timers to beginner skiers & riders
long_description.where: Lava Tube surface lift at Sunrise Base Area
long_description.when: For building foundational skills and learning to edge and turn on your skis or snowboard

properties.name: Progression Park / & // at Lava Tube Carpet Lift

properties.short_description: Beginner learning zone featuring freestyle terrain with ride on features at snow level.
properties.name: Progression Park /// on Lower I-5 Run

properties.short_description: An on-snow playground where first time skiers and riders start their progression journey.

long_description.what: An on-snow playground where first time skiers and riders start their progression journey by developing the feeling of sliding on snow
long_description.where: Proposed location for 20/21 is in West Village Base Area, on-snow adjacent to the Mountain Gateway building
long_description.when: Beginning your snow sliding experience on skis or a snowboard

properties.name: Start Park

properties.short_description: Terrain is open, but no features. A family friendly adventure zone featuring trails through open glades that follow the natural dips, rolls, twists and turns of the volcanically-shaped terrain

long_description.what: A family friendly zone that dips in and out of the forest with small rollers and banked turns to familiarize beginner skiers and riders with off-piste terrain
long_description.where: Accessed from the top of Alpenglow chairlift in Sunrise base area
long_description.when: To practice riding through forested runs and to see aspects of Mt. Bachelor's geologic and volcanic history in action

properties.name: Volcano Adventure Zone

properties.short_description: 2/10: Closed for event.
properties.name: Family Cross on Lower Flying Dutchman

properties.short_description: Family-friendly, experiential terrain with fun and flowy features best accessed via Rainbow Chair.
properties.name: Otter Rock

properties.short_description: Large variety of jumps, rails, boxes and other features that frequently change throughout the season.
properties.name: Cannon Beach

properties.short_description: Highest elevation of the Sky Parks with a variety of changing features including wallrides, rails, tubes, and boxes.
properties.name: Pacific City

properties.short_description: 2/5: Please respect rope closures as active cats are working in this area today.
properties.name: Performance Venue

properties.short_description: 2/5: Please respect rope closures as active cats are working in this area today.
properties.name: Superpipe

properties.short_description: Largest big air jump line at Mt. Bachelor; for advanced park riders only.
properties.name: The Point
